public class SendMidi
extends java.lang.Object

Constructor Detail

SendMidi

public SendMidi(processing.core.PApplet papplet,
                java.lang.String midiDevice,
                int midiChannel)
Opens the specified MIDI device.

Parameters:
papplet - The processing applet to send the MIDI messages from.
midiDevice - PART of the name of the MIDI device to send the note messages to.
midiChannel - MIDI channel to send the note messages to; 0<=midiChannel<=15

Close MIDI device when quitting. FIXME won't get called - but actually it isn't needed either

noteOn

public void noteOn(int midiNoteNumber,
                   int velocity)
Turns on the voice with the given MIDI note number and velocity.

Parameters:
midiNoteNumber - The MIDI note number to turn on.
velocity - Velocity of the new voice; 0<=velocity<=127

noteOff

public void noteOff(int midiNoteNumber)
Turns off the voice with the given MIDI note number.

Parameters:
midiNoteNumber - The MIDI note number to turn off.
